full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI RJES GNANG BYA TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,TSUL 'DI YANG RANG GI SLOB MA PAndI TA LHA'I RGYAL MTSAN @009B GYIS NAN CHER BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHOS GVA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS SO,, ,,YIG CHA 'DI NANG BZHIN RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI DBANG BSKUR BA'I RGYUN DBEN SA PA LA YOD TSUL PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES GSUNG BA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS THOS SO,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
